pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:6.3: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:6.9: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:6.10: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:6.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:8.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:9.2: agārikassa yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā pacati, sāṭakaṃ vā veṭhanaṃ vā dhovati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
